metadata.title: Saylor’s Preferreds Boom Comes Into Question as Bitcoin Slumps
metadata.description: The plunging value of Bitcoin is piling pressure on the securities Strategy Inc. has been issuing in bulk to buy the asset, raising questions about the financing model of the world’s largest crypto treasury firm.
metadata.keywords: Bitcoin,STRATEGY INC,Michael J Saylor,Cryptocurrency,Capital Markets,US Dollar Spot,Software,Voting Rights,Bonds,Wall Street,crypto,business,cryptocurrencies
